comment: Shipping took awhile but seller dispatch out as soon as stock received at warehouse. Good quality product. Highly recommended!

Fast and friendly delivery.
Very basic monitor, stand can only tilt.
At the corner of the screen is slightly dimmer, but can't capture by phone camera. 
Otherwise good for WFH use.

Delivery was very fast and just in 3 days after placing the order. It was very well packed. Tested tp be working fine and the screen colour is beautiful with no dead pixel. Very good value for the price. Hope that it can last more then 3 years.
Received in a box. Delivered just the right time for use tomorrow
